memoryBasedSchedulingEnabled.label: Slurm Memory Based Scheduling Enabled
memoryBasedSchedulingEnabled.help: If enabled, users may use --mem to specify the amount of memory per node required by a job. For more information, see the <0>Slurm documentation for ConstrainRAMSpace

requiredMemory.description: Real memory required per node, in MB. A memory size specification of zero is treated as a special case and grants the job access to all of the memory on each node. [optional]
